author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
PWA Progressive Web Apps were something Firefox was experimenting with a few years but was ultimately scrapped but finally after every other browser has them even Firefox on Android finally Mozilla is coming back to it.

title: Firefox Is Reviving Progressive Web Apps
